subject: thanks for the reply frank
author: bhali333
full_text:
hey Frank,
thanks for the reply to my post. I am disabled from toxins I breathed 
at ground zero during rescue and recovery efforts, I was a first 
responder so we got the worst of it and it has left me with a lung 
disease and two heart attacks but I'm not handicaped I have total 
mobility I just have to take it easy. So as you may see I have alot of 
time for experimenting and have been doing evp research as well as itc 
for some time now and your box has touched a special cord with me it 
just feels like I should have and be using one. Don't ask me to explain 
it's just this wierd feeling like something is telling me you are meant 
to use this tool. If you can ever see your way clear as to building one 
for me I would be more than glad to pay for your time labor and 
materials and would be forever appreciative.

your friend 
Bruce Halliday
